roleset.name: sincere
roleset.note: GENUINE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from genuine.01-j)

example.name: All args
example.text: To think the Tea Party is genuine in it's pursuit to save the country from " our oppressors " when EVERY move they propose is a basic tenet to strengthen the status quo .
example.arg: in it's pursuit to save the country from " our oppressors "
